'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Points of interest==
* This is a small cavern beneath the fortress of [[Crookspur]] and where you wind up after swimming through the side tunnel towards the light. There's a small crystal spider nest here with minor loot. To access the fortress, you need to go through the iron bars. To do this, you need a [[prybar]], high Might, a Corrode ability, an orlan in the party to reach through the bars, or a Wizard with the spell Form of the Helpless Beast, turning one of your party members into a piglet to open the way. You can also use the exit in the north to leave the fortress and explore the island.

==Loot==
* [[Fine Pollaxe (Deadfire)|Fine Pollaxe]]: On a corpse in the tunnel to the south.
